name: overproduction
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of producing more of something than is needed, or producing too much: The company is in a bad financial position because of overproduction. Many of these subsidies encourage overproduction. See
overproduce
More examplesFewer examplesThe illness caused an overproduction of steroids in her body.Overproduction and low prices caused most mines to close.A tumor on her pituitary gland was causing an overproduction of growth hormone.
